content: eliminating the plain knit rounds rounds 3 and/or 6 or made more pointy by adding a plain round or two between the decrease rounds  use a self-striping yarn in team colors or add a pom-pom to finish the top standard height size l 6 body taller hat size m 7 body lova fan striped yarn  running low on yarn make the hat a headband by ending the body after about 7 or 8 row repeat the ribbing row and then bind off loosely in pattern copyright 2015 anne hurlburt contact anne hurlburt scandia quilt studio 14160 236th st n scandia mn 55073 http //www scandiaquiltsutdio com 2
